entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to use FileSystemWatcher to check if file copying and moving is complete on linux? #33782

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #33811
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WIP: Add name argument for dotnet new #33810
    untriaged, Area-Templates
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #33809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #33808
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #33807
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #33806
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33805
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch the VM image of the macOS #33783
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Use Task.CompletedTask #24462
  • Update branding to 6.0.413 #33801
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.307 #33803
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.316 #33800
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.110 #33802
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.121 #33799
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2214624 #33787
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • dotnet tool install skip unlisted version #28951
  • Replace rollForward in tools runtimeconfig #24817
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Disable JsonSerializer.IsReflectionEnabledByDefault on `PublishTrimmed=true` #33757
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Containers: fix some auth issues. #33753
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Validate existing suppressions and remove unnecessary suppressions when re-generating suppression files #32964
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Add explicit System.Text.Json dependency #33618
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix printed version for APICompat.Tool and GenAPI.Tool #33619
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Use install state in workload manifest provider #33643
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
